dmca.title: Top Secret  wants to keep their Copyright Top Secret
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern;
 
I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am the owner or an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual property rights, said owner being named (private)("IP Owner") (http://www.topsecretrecipes.com/theauthor.asp). I have good faith belief that the materials listed below are not authorized by the above IP Owner, it's agent, or the law and therefore infringe upon the IP Owner's rights.  

Infringing material:

E-book located here:

http://www.floodle.net/extra/ebayinfo/top_secret_recipes.html

Infringed work or right includes any of (private) original recipes, either from his eight books in publication: 
 
Top Secret Recipes (Penguin/Putnam 1993)
More Top Secret Recipes (Penguin/Putnam 1994)
Top Secret Restaurant Recipes (Penguin/Putnam 1997)
Top Secret Recipes Lite (Penguin/Putnam 1998)
Low Fat Top Secret Recipes (Penguin/Putnam 2000)
TSR Sodas, Smoothies, spirits and Shakes (Penguin/Putnam 2002)
Even More Top Secret Recipes (Penguin/Putnam 2002)
The Best of Top Secret Recipes (Penguin/Putnam 2003)
Top Secret Restaurant Recipes II - Registration Number TXu1-198-872
http://www.topsecretrecipes.com/store.asp
or any of the recipes he created for his web site located here:
http://www.topsecretrecipes.com.
 
Furthermore, "Top Secret Recipes" is a registered trademark serial number 75929011. Your use of these words constitutes trademark infringement, punishable by law.


I may be contacted at:
 
(private)
(private) Top Secret Recipes, Inc.
(private)
Las Vegas, NV 89117
(private)
(private)

Please act expeditiously to remove or disable access to the material or items claimed to be infringing. 


Truthfully,

(private)

Top Secret Recipes, Inc.

www.topsecretrecipes.com

"Creating Kitchen Clones of America's Favorite Brand-Name Foods"
